pull.title: ci: misc cleanups
pull.body:
Some minor cleanups:

* Remove unused and unmaintained extended_lint to avoid ci bottlenecks and waste of CPU
* Move all folders that hold temporary ci files to the ci scratch dir (except for the build dirs)
* Add some documentation to folders and remove the `BASE_BUILD_DIR` alias for the root directory
* Fixes #17178 by removing `cd`

verification.payload:
tree a39ec6bf8b8e4b9dcb6082b13569ba7323e686b1
parent 41162c0ba0a1aab8110ad65c4035c7087dce0f84
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1574295055 -0500
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1574297786 -0500

scripted-diff: Move various folders to ci scratch dir

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
 # move ci sanitizer-output
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR}/sanitizer-output|BASE_SCRATCH_DIR}/sanitizer-output|g' $(git grep -l BASE_BUILD_DIR ci)
 # move qa-assets
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR}/qa-assets|BASE_SCRATCH_DIR}/qa-assets|g'               $(git grep -l BASE_BUILD_DIR ci)
 # move out dir
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR/out|BASE_SCRATCH_DIR/out|g'                             $(git grep -l BASE_BUILD_DIR ci)
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

verification.payload:
tree 6547e7cff6b10569759fd69b1a78ac6e9beacdb0
parent fa0656d1ebc2a01d900fead4ce055d59eb818a1f
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1574296822 -0500
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1574352094 -0500

scripted-diff: Use ci DEPENDS_DIR, remove BASE_BUILD_DIR

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
 # Use ci DEPENDS_DIR
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR/depends|DEPENDS_DIR|g' $(git grep -l depends ci)
 sed -i -e 's| depends/| ${DEPENDS_DIR}/|g'         $(git grep -l depends ci)

 # Remove redundant alias
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR|BASE_ROOT_DIR|g'       $(git grep -l BASE_BUILD_DIR ci)
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

events.message:
scripted-diff: Use ci DEPENDS_DIR, remove BASE_BUILD_DIR

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
 # Use ci DEPENDS_DIR
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR/depends|DEPENDS_DIR|g' $(git grep -l depends ci)
 sed -i -e 's| depends/| ${DEPENDS_DIR}/|g'         $(git grep -l depends ci)

 # Remove redundant alias
 sed -i -e 's|BASE_BUILD_DIR|BASE_ROOT_DIR|g'       $(git grep -l BASE_BUILD_DIR ci)
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17517](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17517.html) (ci: Bump to clang-8 for asan build to avoid segfaults on ppc64le by MarcoFalke)
* [#12134](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/12134.html) (Build previous releases and run functional tests by Sjors)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.
